articles.description: Three AI models that may change the world. ChatGPT vs. Microsoft Bing vs. Google Bard? Which of them operates on acceptable technology in the present and future?
articles.content: Creativity varied across chatbots, with ChatGPT boasting in a tech review about its own prowess and Bing Chat crafting a LinkedIn post about a fictional app. When testing the models' limits, Bing Cha… [+614 chars]
